game

Class CurrentPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Element
      • game.CurrentPlayer

  • public class CurrentPlayer
extends Element
    The CurrentPlayer class stores the score of the player.
    Version:
    1.0, May 21 2014. (point system), 1.1, May 22 2014. (now extends Element, with location, name, etc.), 1.2, May 24 2014. (Coded basic logic for keyboard determined movement.), 1.3, May 26 2014. (Overloaded Element's empty "update" override.), 1.4, May 27 2014. (added setCanMove, and setCurrentStep(empty)), 1.5, May 28 2014. (added getCharge (empty)), 1.6, May 29 2014. (JavaDoc all parts), 1.7, June 3 2014. (Player can have negative points, added method to set icon), 1.8, June 5 2014. (JavaDoc is current, removed some methods)
    Author:
    Anqi Wu, Chusa Nguyen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int points
      points - int - Stores the current number of points the user has.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CurrentPlayer

        public CurrentPlayer(java.lang.String newName,
             Location newLocation)
        The constructor creates a new CurrentPlayer object, while setting the name, location, and icon.
        Parameters:
        newName - - String - Stores the name of the element (should be 'Launcher').
        newLocation - - Location - Stores the initial location of the launcher.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Empty override from the Element class.
        Specified by:
        update in class Element

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(int direction)
        Checks whether the launcher can move depending on the location of the launcher. It returns true all times except when the launcher is on the two edges of the screen.
        Parameters:
        direction - - int - The direction as the ASCII value of the keyboard key.

      • move

        public void move(int direction)
        Moves the launcher one column in the direction set by the parameters. It changes the location of the launcher.
        Parameters:
        direction - - int - The direction as the ASCII value of the keyboard key. (37 is left, and 39 is right)

      • update

        public void update(int movement)

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints(int add)
        Adds the number of points to the current points as specified by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        add - - int - The number of points to add.

      • removePoints

        public void removePoints(int remove)
        Removes the number of points from the current points as specified by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        remove - - int - The number of points to remove.

      • getCurrentPoints

        public int getCurrentPoints()
        Returns the current number of points of the player.
